thread.title: NYT Columnist Asks Americans To BREAK THE LAW To Bring Down Trump…
thread.title_full: NYT Columnist Asks Americans To BREAK THE LAW To Bring Down Trump…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: NYT Columnist Asks Americans To BREAK THE LAW To Bring Down Trump…
text:
— Pradheep Shanker MD (@Neoavatara) March 6, 2017 I didn't like how the election came out, so please send me some presidential tax info…no big deal… https://t.co/goqgTuA0o9 
— Bob McAdam (@4mcadam) March 6, 2017 #NewYorkTimes writer soliciting IRS employees to commit felony, which is itself a felony if I'm not mistaken. @FBI https://t.co/gXuCtuKIRG 
— Randy Brister (@RandalBrister) March 6, 2017 How about we see your tax returns and put a lot of scrutiny if you take influence money from Soros. https://t.co/vuMQ0m1wS0 
— Fistful of Doom (@fistfulofdoom) March 6, 2017 Oh cool, here's The NY Times asking someone to commit a federal crime because they don't like results of the election. https://t.co/T1XoutruEs 
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 6, 2017 
We can do better than this. 
Can’t we? 
It’s so silly how the left is so wrapped up with this Trump taxes thing. 
What do they think is in there? 
Trump is rich. We know that. He pays as little in taxes as he can. We know that. 
The American people made it clear they don’t care about Trump’s taxes. Time to move on guys. 
This is just another sign that the left is desperate. 
Since the inauguration, they haven’t fought back with ideas or better policies. 
They’ve lied, smeared, and basically encouraged lawlessness to get results. 
Sad and intellectually bankrupt.
